title: Introducing: LIKHA
body:
There’s a real 00’s garage feel to the beat on this debut track from **LIKHA **(Australia’s Carly Bettinson).

Bold, energetic synth pop, combining an almost house-esque chorus hook, it’s an ambitious and addictive first offering. Check out _Buzz_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
